page.title: 06JONATHAN GARNER'S DAY
page.content: I like Tuesdays best of the 5 school days because we have apparatus and we have the ropes and the wallbars the big roll mat and the boxes.I get up at half past 6 in the morning and get dressed have breakfast get ready for school put my coat on and get my satchel. School starts at 9 O'clock Mrs Brooks does the register and we go to assembly. I am 7 years old and my name is Jonathan Garner . School finishes at 3 O'clock. And I go to my child minder's and watch TV. At 4 O'clock children's ITV is on and I watch it .Mum comes back at 5 O'clock and takes us home and we have tea. Dad comes home at 7 O'clock.
